page.title: 04Farming
page.content: {A FARMER'S YEAR { {January:}A long month when fodder seems to go quickly,mostly feeding of animals,bedding and scraping out.Crushing the barley and making up feed for the calves. {February:}February is a month when we like some hard frost so that we are able to get shed muck out and spread slag and lime on grass fields,as this is a long time fertilizer. {March:}March is the month when we do all our seed dressing for ourselves and our customers.We also start to sell fat cattle,a few every week. {April:}This is quite a busy month as this is when the cows start to calf.Also the spring barley is sown.The fertilizer is spread on all grass fields. {continued on page 5}
